#Text=Wikinews interviews Brad Lord-Leutwyler , independent candidate for US President
#Text=Saturday , February 16 , 2008

#Text=While nearly all cover of the 2008 Presidential election has focused on the Democratic and Republican candidates , there are small political parties offering candidates , and those who choose to run without a party behind them , independents .
#Text=Wikinews is interviewing some of these citizens who are looking to become the 43rd person elected to serve their nation from 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW .
#Text=Our third interview is with Henderson , Nevada ' s Brad Lord-Leutwyler , a professor of logic and critical thought at the University of Nevada , Las Vegas .
#Text=Capitalisation and formatting is that of the candidate , not Wikinews .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Why do you want to be President ?
#Text=I do not WANT to be the President .

#Text=The major party candidates have two fatal flaws : They cannot " make change happen " because they will always have to fight the other party in congress , and they are all so indebted to their contributors that they are going to have to " pay back " the FIFTY to ONE HUNDRED MILLION DOLLARS they raised with special favors .
#Text=OBAMA is guilty of doing it already , as are McCain and Clinton .
#Text=NOT I. CHANGE WILL ONLY COME FROM AN INDEPENDENT PRESIDENT .

#Text=Congress will KNOW that the People have had enough if I am sent to Washington , and they WILL make the change we demand for fear of WE THE PEOPLE voting them out of office too : they love their cushy jobs , and WE need to make them fearful of losing them .
#Text=I WILL END THE WAR
#Text=I WILL SECURE THE BORDER
#Text=I WILL WIPE OUT POVERTY
#Text=I WILL FIX THE EDUCATION CRISIS
#Text=I WILL GET UNIVERSAL HEALTHCARE .
#Text=Have you ever run for political office before ?
#Text=NO
#Text=Have you ever been a member of a political party , other than the one you 're currently in ?
#Text=I AM NOT A MEMBER OF A PARTY NOW .
#Text=I used to belong to the democratic and republican parties until BOTH of those parties put the interests of their party above that of the people .
#Text=Have you ever campaigned for another political candidate ?
#Text=NO
#Text=What is your current job ?
#Text=COLLEGE PROFESSOR -Teacher of Logic and critical thought at the University of Nevada , Las Vegas .
#Text=What skills or ideas do you bring from this position , or previous positions , that will benefit the Oval Office ?
#Text=ALL OF OUR IDEAS ARE POSTED AT WWW . VOTEFORBRAD . COM .
#Text=They are not designed to benefit the oval office .
#Text=They are designed to benefit ALL AMERICANS .
#Text=Obviously , the next American President and his or her administration will face many diverse issues .
#Text=But if you were to narrow identify the three most important issues , what would they be ?
#Text=How will you address these issues ?
#Text=1 ) WAR/NATIONAL SECURITY- End it NOW .
#Text=Bring the troops home .
#Text=See WWW . VOTEFORBRAD .
#Text=COM for details .
#Text=2 ) ECONOMY - Banks and financial/investment institutions have had the last seven years to prove how they will behave under relaxed regulation .
#Text=They created the sub-prime debacle in the process .
#Text=They cannot be trusted to act in a responsible manner which takes into account the best interest of the American people .
#Text=Rather , they act in a greedy and selfish fashion .
#Text=Theses key institutions need greater regulatory oversight .
#Text=Also , government spending needs to be brought under control .
#Text=Obama says that he will pay for his plans with the money he saves by ending the war .
#Text=THIS IS A LIE !
#Text=The war is funded by deficit spending .
#Text=Stopping the war and then spending the money is STILL DEFICIT SPENDING .
#Text=3 ) POVERTY/EDUCATION - Education and poverty are intimately linked .
#Text=Thomas Jefferson knew it .
#Text=MLK knew it .
#Text=I learned it from them .
#Text=When you deny proper education , you create poverty , you weaken your economy , you weaken your defenses , you WEAKEN your nation .
#Text=NO CHILD LEFT BEHIND must be eliminated and replaced with an intelligent plan , not a specious , knee-jerk fool 's errand .
#Text=Campaigning for the American presidency is one of the most expensive exercises in the world .
#Text=How do you deal with the cost and fundraising ?
#Text=WE HAVE OVER 3,000,000 supporters and we have not spent a dime .
#Text=Word of mouth on the internet is our primary way of promoting the campaign .
#Text=IT IS OBSCENE to be spending 150 MILLION DOLLARS on a campaign .
#Text=It is also irresponsible and immoral .
#Text=I REFUSE to do it .
#Text=Do you have a running mate yet ?
#Text=Who are they ?
#Text=What are you/were you looking for in a running mate ?
#Text=WE ARE DRAFTING GEN .
#Text=COLIN POWELL AS OUR RUNNING MATE .
#Text=Can you win the 2008 Presidential election ?
#Text=Can any third party or independent candidate ever win ?
#Text=ANY person can win the Presidency .
#Text=THE AMERICAN PEOPLE need to take responsibility for their government , STOP FALLING FOR EMPTY SLOGANS and start THINKING about who they are voting for and why .
#Text=As soon as Americans THINK about those issues , the major parties will be in serious trouble .
#Text=If you ca n't make it into the Oval Office , who would you prefer seeing taking the presidency ?
#Text=Colin Powell .
#Text=What should the American people keep in mind , when heading to the polls this November ?
#Text=Vote for the best candidate with the best team of thinkers .
#Text=Republicans voted for Bush because they did not want Kerry , NOT because they loved Bush .
#Text=Now , MOST republicans regret their choice .
#Text=Democrats do the same thing .
#Text=THE BEST CANDIDATE and team is found at WWW . VOTEFORBRAD . COM .

#Text=If you vote with your BRAIN and NOT with irrational fear ( i. e. " If I vote for Brad , I might be helping candidate XXX win . " is irrational , illogical and IS WHY WE ARE IN THE MESS WE ARE IN .
